Name: lambda 5 deficiency
Definition: A B cell deficiency that has_material_basis_in mutations in the IGLL1 gene. Lambda 5 mutations can cause a block in B cell development at the transition between the pro-B cell and the pre-B cell stage.

Name: immunoglobulin alpha deficiency
Definition: A B cell deficiency that is an autosomal recessive disorder that has_material_basis_in mutation in the IgA (CD79 alpha) antigen receptor.

Name: immunoglobulin beta deficiency
Definition: A B cell deficiency that is characterized by mucosal infections and autoimmune diseases due to lack of production of immunoglobulin A antibody

Name: congenital hypogammaglobulinemia
Definition: A dysgammaglobulinemia that is characterized by isolated deficiency of an IgG subclass

Name: obsolete immunodeficiency with increased IgM
Definition: A dysgammaglobulinemia that is characterized by isolated deficiency of an IgG subclass

Name: agammaglobulinemia
Definition: A B cell deficiency that is caused by a reduction in all types of gamma globulins.

Name: obsolete nephrotic syndrome with lesion of endothelial glomerulonephritis
Definition: A B cell deficiency that is caused by a reduction in all types of gamma globulins.

Name: obsolete nephrotic syndrome with lesion of segmental hyalinosis
Definition: A B cell deficiency that is caused by a reduction in all types of gamma globulins.

Name: obsolete nephrotic syndrome with lesion of hypocomplementemic glomerulonephritis
Definition: A B cell deficiency that is caused by a reduction in all types of gamma globulins.
Synonym: Nephrotic syndrome with Lesion of Hypocomplementemic Glomerulonephritis

Name: obsolete nephrotic syndrome with lesion of mesangiocapillary glomerulonephritis
Definition: A B cell deficiency that is caused by a reduction in all types of gamma globulins.
Synonym: Nephrotic syndrome with Lesion of Mesangiocapillary Glomerulonephritis

Name: obsolete nephrotic syndrome with lesion of persistent glomerulonephritis
Definition: A B cell deficiency that is caused by a reduction in all types of gamma globulins.
Synonym: Nephrotic syndrome with Lesion of Persistent Glomerulonephritis

Name: obsolete nephrotic syndrome with lesion of membranous glomerulonephritis
Definition: A B cell deficiency that is caused by a reduction in all types of gamma globulins.
Synonym: Nephrotic syndrome with lesion of membranous glomerulonephritis

Name: obsolete abortion complicated by embolism
Definition: A B cell deficiency that is caused by a reduction in all types of gamma globulins.
Synonym: Nephrotic syndrome with lesion of membranous glomerulonephritis

Name: hyperimmunoglobulin syndrome
Definition: A B cell deficiency that is characterized by relative predominance of certain immunoglobulin subtypes and deficiencies of others.

Name: selective immunoglobulin deficiency disease
Definition: A B cell deficiency that is characterized by deficiency of an immunoglobulin subtype. The clinical course and prognosis is dependent upon the severity of the selective deficiency and associated morbidity.
